last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: To celebrate a job well done, Tsuda makes himself a nice meal of panfried salmon with creamy walnut sauce, accompanied by a plate of peperoncino udon.

name: The Ingenuity of the Househusband
overview: A tough guy with a knack for housework tackles household tasks with meticulous care in these comedic live-action vignettes.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tsuda commences his multistep process for properly sharpening his kitchen knife. Then, he prepares himself a perfect cup of coffee.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When his quiet moment alone with a cup of tea is interrupted by the constant flapping of a torn shoji screen door, Tsuda has no choice but to fix it.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While doing the laundry, Tsuda comes across some challenging stains, but he knows exactly how to handle these situations — at least he usually does.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Polishing his scuffed-up baseball feels so good, Tsuda goes around the house looking for other things in need of the same treatment.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After a particularly raucous celebration, Tsuda carefully sorts through the garbage that was left behind, putting all of it into its correct bin.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Tsuda receives a hefty amount of pork as a gift and sets to work lovingly turning it into the best smoked bacon ever.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Hit with a sudden lunchtime hankering for udon, Tsuda decides to make his own homemade udon noodles from scratch.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: For once, Tsuda decides to take it easy and do nothing the whole day - which is a lot harder than he thought it would be.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: While preparing for some voice acting work, Tsuda gets sidetracked and starts taking apart and cleaning more and more things around the house.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: To celebrate a job well done, Tsuda makes himself a nice meal of panfried salmon with creamy walnut sauce, accompanied by a plate of peperoncino udon.
